articles.title: McDonald and Dodds viewers outraged as ITV show returns with 'awful' special effects - Daily Express
articles.description: MCDONALD AND DODDS viewers were left outraged just moments into the ITV drama's return on Sunday night as they weren't too impressed with the special effects implemented for a hot air balloon scene.
